For the Temple Trekking variant, see Riyl shadow (Temple Trekking).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Riyl Shades are found in the Shade Catacombs beneath Mort'ton, and are fought in the Shades of Mort'ton minigame.

6 January 2021

Riyl Shades were made into spectral creatures.

26 November 2015
(update)

Shades should no longer flicker after retreating.

'''Riyl Shades''' are found in the [[Shade Catacombs]] beneath [[Mort'ton]], and are fought in the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton minigame]].
